needowner: You need to be the owner to do that.
needwl: You need to be whitelisted to do that.
alreadyperm: is already assigned to this permission.
permassigned: has been assigned to the permission
notperm: is not assigned to this permission.
permunassigned: has been removed from the permission
permdesc:
Permission 1 : Highest
Permission 2 : Medium
Permission 3 : Low
By default ban and kick perm is assigned to perm 2, if you give it to someone with perm 3 he will have access to the perm 2 commands.
Important : when you mute, kick, ban someone a sanction is added in his list so don't forget to put a reason !
nosanction: This user don't have any sanction.
settingsmoddesc:
üí¨ : to setup member/mute role.
üí£ : to setup ban/unban/kick functions and perm role.
üîª : to setup warn/unwarn functions.
üéüÔ∏è : to setup the ticket system.
‚úÖ : to save all settings.
‚ùå : cancel all.
activmutefunction: Do you want to active mute/unmute/tempmute functions ? yes/no/stop
givememberid: Give me the `member` role id or send stop
givemuteid: Give me the `mute` role id or send stop
activebanfunction: Do you want to active ban/kick/unban functions ? yes/no/stop
banassigned:
Perm ban/kick/unban assigned to the role @üí£ 
`In the list of server roles : do not forget to replace the role at a good position !`
activewarnfunction: Do you want to active warn/unwarn functions ? yes/no/stop
reallywantquit: You really want to cancel all progression ? yes/no
activeticketfunction: Do you want to activate the ticket system ? yes/no/stop
giveticketchannel: Give me the id of the channel for ticket commands or send stop
giveticketrole: Give me the id of the tickets moderator role (This will be the minimum role to respond to the tickets) or send stop
nomuterole: I have no mute role registed for this server.
noreason: You need to put a good reason.
hasbeenmuted: has been muted for the next reason :
invalidlang: This language is not available, for the moment only **French** and **English** are available. `'fr' | 'en'`
welcomemsg: [member] : __welcome__ in **[server]** with you we are now **[membercount]** !
newaccount: has been detected like a new account and get kicked.
alreadyticket: You already have a ticket open.
closeticket: to delete and close the ticket !
deleteticket: The channel will be deleted and the ticket closed in 3 seconds.
noticket: This user don't have any ticket open.
errorticket: Error, maybe the channel is already deleted. If he can't create a channel try the command `ticket reset <user id>` !
ticketrest: Tickets of [member] has been reset in my database.
rolebanproblem: I get a problem with the role perm ban/kick/unban assigned to this server.
nopermban: You don't have the permission to ban/kick/unban a member, you need this role :
hasbeenbanned: has been banned for the next reason :
hasbeenkicked: has been kicked for the next reason :
nounban: This user is not existing or he is not banned.
failkick: fail the captcha and get kicked.
resolvecatpcha: resolve the captcha and have now access to the server.
captchanoanswer: is not answering to the captcha so i kick him.
ticketdelete: to delete and close your ticket
ticketclose: to delete and close the ticket of someone
webhookprtc: **üõ°Ô∏è | An attempt was made to create a Webhook on the channel [channame] by [memberowner] (id : [memberid]) The channel has been recreated and the user has been [deranked].**
channelcreateprtc: **üõ°Ô∏è | An attempt was made to create the channel : [channame] by [memberowner] (id : [memberid]) The channel has been deleted and the user has been [deranked].**
channeldeleteprtc: **üõ°Ô∏è | An attempt was made to delete the channel : [channame] by [memberowner] (id : [memberid]) The channel has been recreated and the user has been [deranked].**
rolecreateprtc: **üõ°Ô∏è | An attempt was made to create the role : [channame] by [memberowner] (id : [memberid]) The role has been deleted and the user has been [deranked].**
roledeleteprtc: **üõ°Ô∏è | An attempt was made to delete the role : [channame] by [memberowner] (id : [memberid]) The role has been recreated and the user has been [deranked].**
roleupdateprtc: **üõ°Ô∏è | An attempt was made to edit the role : [channame] by [memberowner] (id : [memberid]) The role has been re-edited and the user has been [deranked].**
roleaddprtc: **üõ°Ô∏è | An attempt was made to add the role : [channame] to [target] by [memberowner] (id : [memberid]) The role has been removed and the user has been [deranked].**
roleremoveprtc: **üõ°Ô∏è | An attempt was made to remove the role : [channame] to [target] by [memberowner] (id : [memberid]) The role has been added back and the user has been [deranked].**
nukedinfo: If this channel was related to a bot function don't forget to put this new one on the bot dashboard !
toget: To get put in your status :
lastdeleted: Last message deleted on the server :
whattitlefield: What's the title of the field ?
whatdescriptionfield: What's the description of the field ?
whattitleremove: What's the **title** of the field to delete ?
sendembed: Give the channel id and i will send the message in. If you want i send the message here just send 'here'
banprtc: **üõ°Ô∏è | An attempt was made to ban a member by [memberowner] (id : [memberid]) on [victime]. I unban him and the user has been [deranked].**
guildprtc: **üõ°Ô∏è | An attempt was made to edit the server by [memberowner] (id : [memberid]). The server has been re-edited and the user has been [deranked].**

desc.wl: Manage the users whitelist of the server.
desc.bl: Manage the users blacklist of the server.
desc.perm: Manage the roles permission level of the server.
desc.sanction: Show all sanctions of the mentionned user.
desc.mute: Mute a member, after that he can't send a message in the server.
desc.tempmute: Mute a member during a defined time.
desc.setlang: Change the language of the bot for your server.
desc.setprefix: Change the prefix of the bot for your server.
desc.ping: Get the reaction time of the bot and his api.
desc.level: Show your level and the number of messages you have been sent.
desc.leaderboard: Show the levels(or messages) leaderboard of the server.
desc.clear: Clear a number of messages with one command.
desc.ticket: Create your channel to contact a mod.
desc.ban: Ban a member from the server.
desc.kick: Kick a member from the server.
desc.unban: Unban a member from the server.
desc.warn: Add a sanction to a user.
desc.nuke: Delete the channel and recreate it.
desc.slowdown: Edit the slowdown of the channel with no limit.
desc.lock: Remove the permission to send messages.
desc.unlock: Add back the permission to send messages.
desc.snipe: Show the last message deleted on the server.
desc.pp: Show the profile picture of urself or the mentionned user.
desc.Sinfos: Show some informations about the server.
desc.infos: Show some informations about urself or the mentionned user.
desc.cry: Send a picture of someone who cry.
desc.kiss: Send a picture of someone who make a kiss.
desc.hug: Send a picture of someone who make a hug.
desc.pat: Send a picture of someone who pat someone.
desc.slap: Send a picture of someone who slap someone.
desc.smile: Send a picture of someone who smile.
desc.fight: Send a picture of someone who fight someone.
desc.waifu: Send a picture of a waifu.
desc.derank: Remove all roles of someone (add the default role after if setup).
desc.permchecker: Show all permissions of a member in the server.
desc.botslist: Show all bots on the server.
desc.giveaway: Create an event and the bot choose a random winner.
desc.spam: Add or remove a channel of the anti-spam protection.
desc.reactionrole: Setup a reaction role on a message, when someone interact with the reaction its adding/removing the role set.
desc.8ball: Ask a question and the bot will answer.
desc.anime: Get some informations about an anime.
desc.github: Get some informations about an github account.
desc.instagram: Get some informations about an instagram account.
desc.Rinfos: Get some informations about a role of the server.
desc.remove-everyone: Remove the permission to mention everyone and here to the everyone role and member role if set.
desc.role: Add or remove a role to someone.
desc.rwl: Add a role in the whitelist and protect it. (Anti-role)
desc.settings: Edit my settings for this server.
desc.owner: Add/Remove a owner from the bot.
desc.backup: Create or load a backup, channels, roles and permissions saved.
desc.setactivity: Change the message activity of the bot.
desc.setavatar: Change the avatar of the bot.
desc.setname: Change the name of the bot.
desc.setstatus: Change the status of the bot.
desc.prevname: Get all old username of someone registred in my database.
desc.ascii: Send a text with the format ascii.
desc.say: Tell me something and i will send it in the channel.
desc.unwarn: Remove a sanction from a user.
desc.setactivitytype: Change the activity type of the bot (STREAMING, PLAYING, etc).
desc.invite: Get the total invites count of a member.
desc.boosters: Show the list of boosters from the server.
desc.rewards: Add/Remove a reward (a role) to a member who get a specific invite count or level.
